arts.ttl: Xabi Alonso talks Mbappe, Vinicius, Guler, Camavinga after Getafe 0-1 Real Madrid
arts.sum: Two late red cards for Getafe helped Real Madrid secure a 1-0 win at Coliseum Alfonso Perez last night in a game that quite easily could have ended in a draw. Los Blancos struggled to break through the hosts’ rearguard, and unsurprisingly so given the tight defensive lines and low block. arts.ttl: Red card madness: Mbappe scores again as Real benefit against nine-man Getafe
arts.sum: Real Madrid win their eighth game of the 2025-26 La Liga season, beating Getafe 1-0 at Estadio Coliseum on Sunday night.

arts.ttl: Kylian Mbappe nets late winner as Real Madrid beat nine-man Getafe to go top
arts.sum: Getafe were frustrating their big city neighbours until substitute Allan Nyom was sent off following a clash with Vinicius Junior.

arts.sum: Real Madrid Starting Lineup vs Getafe: Against Getafe, David Alaba comes in to partner with Eder Militao, and Álvaro Carreras continues at left back.
